title: "Artificial intelligence presents new opportunities for educators, experts say"
excerpt: "OpenAI — among other artificial intelligence brands — have created products like ChatGPT which allow anyone to write an essay, find sources and answer complex questions in under a minute. With this monumental change in technological ability, teachers and students are questioning what it means for the future of the classroom as it’s known."
